<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if a unit has the given weapon in hands or on back/in holster. Weapons inside unit containers such as vest and backpack are not counted.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''hasWeapon''' weaponName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] - the name of the weapon to check for.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] -  
Returns true if the unit has the weapon, false if not.
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] !([[player]] [[hasWeapon]] "arifle_MX_ACO_pointer_F") [[then]] { [[player]] [[addWeapon]] "arifle_MX_ACO_pointer_F" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weapons]]
</value></part></template>

<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command doesn't work for Items in Arma 3, use this instead.
<code>"[[Arma_3_CfgWeapons_Items#ItemGPS|ItemGPS]]" [[in]] ([[items]] [[player]] [[valuea_plus_valueb|+]] [[assignedItems]] [[player]])<br>'''OR'''<br>'[[Arma_3_CfgWeapons_Items#ItemGPS|ItemGPS]]' [[in]] ([[items]] [[player]] [[valuea_plus_valueb|+]] [[assignedItems]] [[player]]) </code>
Returns [[true]] if unit has gps in inventory, assigned or not.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
